What is docs-as-code? http://example.org/docs-as-code/ Mon, 23 Nov 2020 00:00:00 +0000
http://example.org/docs-as-code/ >>>>>>> 095a2b7f1276a74a1ab37f42971ebbcc4d26215b What is a docs-as-code workflow? A docs-as-code workflow means applying software development processes and tools to technical documentation. As a Technical Writer (TW), you write content in plain text format using a code editor, rather than a markup language like XML and a content management system. You publish docs using a static site generator rather than a complex publishing system. TWs work with docs as developers work with code, relying on a source control system to track changes in the documentation suite.
Siobh치n Keating - Technical Writer <<<<<<< HEAD https://example.com/siobhan-keating-technical-writer/ Wed, 18 Nov 2020 15:18:25 +0000
https://example.com/siobhan-keating-technical-writer/ ======= http://example.org/siobhan-keating-technical-writer/ Wed, 18 Nov 2020 15:18:25 +0000
http://example.org/siobhan-keating-technical-writer/ >>>>>>> 095a2b7f1276a74a1ab37f42971ebbcc4d26215b I am a technical writer I love to write and I feel my writing helps people understand technology and apply knowledge in their use of an application or system. I have 20 year’s experience working in the IT sector. I include here some generic examples of my writing, to demonstrate what technical writing means to me and to describe my experience of the docs-as-code workflow. What is a Technical Writer Best practices for technical documentation What is docs-as-code?
What is a Technical Writer? <<<<<<< HEAD https://example.com/what-is-a-technical-writer/ Wed, 18 Nov 2020 15:18:25 +0000
https://example.com/what-is-a-technical-writer/ ======= http://example.org/what-is-a-technical-writer/ Wed, 18 Nov 2020 15:18:25 +0000
http://example.org/what-is-a-technical-writer/ >>>>>>> 095a2b7f1276a74a1ab37f42971ebbcc4d26215b ##What is a Technical Writer?## A Technical Writer (TW) is someone who creates, structures, and publishes relevant information for a target audience in a timely manner. A TW generally works in a specific industry sector, creating modular content to describe complex products or processes. Their role is to bridge the information gap between product developer and end-user, juggling a diverse set of tools for communication, project management, content design, and publishing.
Best practices for developer documentation <<<<<<< HEAD https://example.com/best-practice-for-tech-docs/ Wed, 18 Nov 2020 00:00:00 +0000
https://example.com/best-practice-for-tech-docs/ ======= http://example.org/best-practice-for-tech-docs/ Wed, 18 Nov 2020 00:00:00 +0000
http://example.org/best-practice-for-tech-docs/ >>>>>>> 095a2b7f1276a74a1ab37f42971ebbcc4d26215b Structure your documentation It is important to structure your content in an easy-to-navigate manner. Navigation structure To develop a clear visual hierarchy on your documentation website: Organise menus by topic Group similar types of content under the same menu Use a maximum of two levels of submenu Make the documentation searchable Documentation must be searchable and information easy to find. Some recommendations include: Create short, unique, and accurate page titles.
